message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, and it's still below my minimum asking price. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $10,500 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is still a good deal for you, considering the value of the product.  What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,750. I'm trying to stay within my budget, and I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but $10,750 simply won't work for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000, and that's my final offer. If you're not comfortable with that, I'll have to explore other options.
